ygData.subject: Re: Where do we go from here?
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know, But if there is a Gnome guild out there on Fennin Ro . I am thinking of changing guilds to where I can develop and not worry about prejeduces
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know, But if there is a Gnome guild out there on Fennin Ro . I am
thinking of changing guilds to where I can develop and not worry about
prejeduces from the tall races. If i were to recieve an invite From a gnome
guild at this point I would gladly join them since my guild where i currently
reside has very little activity in cooperation except in the warrior
type...Sincerely a tired of soloing gnome..... Cloverleaf (23rd season
enchanter extrordinare)
